items.name: Scholz Garten
items.notes: Historic Austin beer garden and restaurant known for German fare, local beers, and a lively pre-event atmosphere near the University of Texas campus.

items.name: Cuantos Tacos
items.notes: Austin favorite serving authentic Mexico City–style street tacos with handmade tortillas and bold flavors.

items.name: Salty Sow
items.notes: Popular gastropub offering elevated comfort food, craft cocktails, and a strong whiskey selection.

items.name: Sour Duck Market
items.address: 1814 E Martin Luther King Jr Blvd, Austin, TX 78702
items.notes: Neighborhood bakery, café, and beer garden serving house-made pastries, sandwiches, and locally sourced dishes.

items.name: Swim Club
items.notes: Trendy outdoor bar and grill known for frozen cocktails, burgers, and a laid-back Austin vibe.

items.name: The Social House
items.notes: Upscale American restaurant and bar offering shareable plates, cocktails, and a lively social atmosphere near the arena.

items.name: Rodeo Goat
items.notes: Award-winning burger joint known for creative burgers, craft beer, and a fun, casual vibe.

items.name: Blue Sushi Sake Grill
items.notes: Modern sushi restaurant offering creative rolls, sashimi, and an extensive sake and cocktail menu.

items.name: Heim Barbecue
items.address: 1109 W Magnolia Ave, Fort Worth, TX 76104
items.notes: Fort Worth barbecue staple famous for bacon burnt ends, smoked meats, and classic Texas BBQ sides.

items.name: Joe T. Garcia’s
items.address: 2201 N Commerce St, Fort Worth, TX 76164
items.notes: Iconic Fort Worth Tex-Mex institution with a sprawling patio, classic margaritas, and traditional Mexican dishes.

items.name: Hub Hall
items.notes: Food hall directly connected to TD Garden featuring a curated mix of popular local Boston eateries.

items.name: Ducali Pizzeria
items.notes: Casual Italian spot known for Roman-style pizza and its unbeatable location across from TD Garden.

items.name: Alcove
items.notes: Waterfront restaurant offering seasonal New American dishes, cocktails, and scenic harbor views.

items.name: Chilacates
items.notes: Fast-casual Mexican eatery serving fresh tacos, burritos, bowls, and house-made salsas.

items.name: A&B Kitchen and Bar
items.notes: Contemporary American restaurant offering elevated comfort food and cocktails in a stylish setting.

items.name: Bar Primi
items.notes: Stylish Italian pasta bar known for fresh handmade pastas and classic cocktails.

items.name: Roberta's
items.notes: Cult-favorite pizzeria serving wood-fired pizzas with inventive toppings near MSG.

items.name: Los Tacos No.1
items.notes: Highly regarded taqueria offering authentic Mexican tacos with fresh tortillas and grilled meats.

items.name: Sea
items.notes: Popular Thai restaurant featuring classic dishes in a lively Times Square setting.

items.name: The Dynamo Room
items.notes: Upscale American restaurant and bar offering refined dining and craft cocktails.

items.name: Via Via Food Hall
items.address: 3708 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.notes: European-inspired food hall with multiple chef-driven concepts near Sphere.

items.name: Estiatorio Milos
items.address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.notes: Upscale Greek seafood restaurant known for pristine fish and elegant dining.

items.name: Yardbird Southern Table & Bar
items.address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.notes: Award-winning Southern restaurant famous for fried chicken and comfort food classics.

items.name: SUSHISAMBA
items.address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.notes: High-energy restaurant blending Japanese, Brazilian, and Peruvian cuisine with Strip views.

items.name: CHICA
items.address: 3355 Las Vegas Blvd S, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.notes: Vibrant Latin restaurant serving bold flavors in a lively, upscale atmosphere.

items.name: Cork & Batter
items.notes: Modern American restaurant and bar popular for pre-event dining and cocktails.

items.name: Coni'Seafood
items.notes: Renowned Mexican seafood spot specializing in Nayarit-style dishes.

items.name: Dulan's Soul Food Kitchen
items.notes: Legendary soul food restaurant serving classic comfort dishes.

items.name: Sunday Gravy
items.notes: Italian-American restaurant focused on house-made pasta and rich sauces.

items.name: Stuff I Eat
items.notes: Plant-based comfort food favorite offering vegan burgers, tacos, and soul food classics.
